snippet: Gov. Martin O’Malley of Maryland has hired Bill Hyers, who most recently managed Bill de Blasio’s successful mayoral campaign in New York, as a senior adviser to his O’Say Can You See Pac.
abstract: Gov. Martin O’Malley of Maryland has hired Bill Hyers, who most recently managed Bill de Blasio’s successful mayoral campaign in New York, as a senior adviser to his O’Say Can You See Pac.

headline.main: O'Malley Hires de Blasio Aide for Presidential PAC
